name: Mexican Salad
description: This Mexican salad with cilantro lime dressing makes a great side for BBQs and it's also perfect for lunch. The recipe couldn't be much easier and it's packed with nutrients. Easy, healthy, and delicious at the same time!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
1 cup bell pepper, cut into medium-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and drain the black beans and the corn. Cut the cherry tomatoes into halves and the avocado and the bell pepper into medium-sized pieces. Finely chop the cilantro. Chop the red onion.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and stir until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the dressing over the vegetables and beans and stir well. Enjoy!
